text: Carol Ann Susi (February 2, 1952 â€“ November 11, 2014) was an American actress. She was best known for being the voice of recurring unseen character Mrs. Wolowitz on the television series The Big Bang Theory. On November 11, 2014, Susi died of cancer of unknown primary origin in Los Angeles, California, aged 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer of unknown primary origin Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles
